Overview: Meendum Vaa Arugil Vaa is a bilingual Horror film. Directed by J Jaya Rajendra Cholan

Title: Thollaikatchi
Overview: Thollaikatchi is an upcoming Tamil romantic comedy film directed by M.Sadiq Khan. The film stars Ashwin Kakumanu and Janani Iyer in lead roles with Subbu Panchu, Konjam Nadinga Boss fame Aadhavan, Manobala, Mayilsamy playing supporting roles. The soundtrack is composed by Dharan Kumar. The film is produced by Raja Bala Senthil, B. Kayalvizhi under Kayalaalaya Movies.

Title: Koottali
Overview: Koottali is a Tamil drama movie, directed by Mathi SK. The cast of Koottali includes Aruldoss,Kausalya.

Title: Saranalayam
Overview: Saranalayam is a Tamil movie released on 26 Jan, 2018. The movie is directed by Irasu Jaganathan and featured Ashwin Kumar and Sri Priyanka as lead characters

Title: Ondikatta
Overview: A noble person takes revenge on his ex-lover's husband when he gets to know that she has been tortured.

Title: Manusangada
Overview: When a caste discrimination prevents a villager from giving his deceased father a rightful burial, he takes his fight for equality to court.

Title: Ivanukku Engeyo Macham Irukku
Overview: Two men who work in a pharmacy moonlight as small-time robbers and during one of their break-ins, they walk away with ₹5 lakh each. And soon, the cops, gangsters and a perpetually horny NRI woman are after them…

Title: Ghora
Overview: This horror movie revolves around six college friends, Anand, Sara, Radha, Vimal, Tharan and Laxmi. Despite having feelings for each other, Anand and Laxmi can't take their relationship further due to Laxmi's ex-boyfriend's interference. Hoping for Anand and Laxmi to work things out between them, their friends convince them to go on a road trip to a waterfall. The group of friends enjoy the trip at first but their lives are forever changed after returning from it because now they can feel the presence of a demon around them.

Title: Power to the Children
Overview: Children in India have taken their lives into their own hands. They don’t want to tolerate social grievances as well as environmental pollution any longer. They have been founding childrens parliaments and electing their own ministers in order to stand up for their rights. They are not only changing their own lives for the better, but also those of their communities. This documentary introduces us to several villages in India, whose powerful actions even take their voices to the UN.

Title: Zombie Encounter
Overview: A COP KILLS ZOMBIES TO SAVE THE WOLRD.

Title: Papparapaam
Overview: Papparapaam traces the life of a man who wakes up at his funeral.

Title: Visiri
Overview: Visiri revolves around rival fights between the two biggest stars of Kollywood - Thala Ajith fans and Thalapathy Vijay fans.

Title: Melnaattu Marumagan
Overview: Melnaattu Marumagan (English: Westernised Son-in-law) is a 2018 Tamil action film directed by MSS and produced by Mano Udhayakumar of Udhaya Creations. The film stars Rajkamal and Andreanne Nouyrigat in the leading roles, with Lollu Sabha Manohar and Muthukaalai in supporting roles.

Title: Veerathevan
Overview: Veera Thevan Tamil Movie Starring Kaushik, Meenalotchani, Karate Gopalan in the lead roles.

Title: Uzhaikkum Paadhai
Overview: Kaadhal Paadhai is a romance-cum-road movie, but the best parts are neither the romance nor the road trip.

Title: Sughamaai Subbulakshmi
Overview: The story revolves around people's dilemma and their choice to go for love or for their ambitions. Taking place in different ages, the lead characters will come to understand the meaning of love, friendship and dreams to achieve their life goals.

Title: Nari Vettai
Overview: Directed by Akash Sudhakar.

Title: Neeyum Naanum
Overview: Karthik is a photographer by profession together with his another two friends Arun and Viki. One fine day, he came across Oviya who is after her break-up. Karthik falling in love with her.

Title: Mangai Maanvizhi Ambugal
Overview: A girl waits for her lover to regain his memory, lost due to an accident.

Title: Tamizhananen
Overview: Tamizhanane, the first Tamil film based on martial arts to fight violence against women.

Title: Seyal
Overview: A youngster thrashes a gangster following a minor altercation. The gangster, who suffers a loss of face, now wants revenge.

Title: December 13
Overview: December 13 is a Tamil movie starring Brahmini Murala and Khushi Gadhvi in prominent roles. The movie also star Dhadi Siva. It is a thriller action directed by Bhuvanesh with Naresh as musician, forming part of the crew.

Title: Sea
Overview: Set in the future on the island of Pulau Ubin, two brothers are forced to evacuate their house and leave behind their childhood as sea levels rise dangerously. The film is a thought-provoking meditation on climate change and how it can affect livelihoods and relationships.

Title: Paarka Thonuthe
Overview: The movie is directed by Jai Senthilkumar and featured Arsha and Sarah as lead characters.

Title: Dhachka
Overview: A submissive woman on a family road trip gets frustrated with the constant friction within the family and decides to take control.

Title: 33km From KL
Overview: Benjamin, Gururaj and Satya have gotten involved in an accident. The three men do not know each other and are only connected by the accident they've been in. Benjamin is a millionaire suffering from a mental disorder. Gururaj is a software engineer who has been kidnapped by an assassin but he cannot figure out the reason for the kidnapping, even though it's clear that the motive is revenge and money. Lastly, Satya is a happy-go-lucky young man who is in a reluctant relationship with a girl named Mei Ling.

Title: Aaraam Thinai
Overview: Aaramthinai’ is the upcoming Tamil horror film, which is expected to hit the screens soon in the year of 2018.

Title: TEN RUPEES NOTE
Overview: A COLLEGE BOY TRYING TO GET SOME LUMP OF MONEY FROM HIS DAD.

Title: Kargil
Overview: Arjun is traveling to Bengaluru to attend a US project interview at the same time he was supposed to pick up his girlfriend's father from the airport in Chennai. But things go wrong when Sindhu - his MD, who is also his former girlfriend - decides to complicate life for him.

Title: Slumdog Kodisvaran
Overview: A Mumbai teen who grew up in the slums, is miraculously on the verge of winning the Indian version of "Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?" and is arrested under suspicion of cheating. While being interrogated, events from his life history unfold, explaining why he knows the answers.

Title: Viswasam
Overview: A village ruffian, who settles disputes in his native, takes on a big shot when he tries to sort out the rough patch in his marriage after several years.

Title: Bigil
Overview: A do-gooder don wants his footballer son to uplift the life of his people by becoming a champion, but fate draws the youngster into a life of violence. Will he be able to fulfill his father’s dream when an opportunity comes his way seven years later?

Title: Kaithi
Overview: Dilli, a convicted criminal, is out on parole to meet his daughter. However, a drug bust sets him off on a mission to save the life of police officers.

Title: Thadam
Overview: The murder of a youngster creates confusion among a few cops when they find out that the one accused in the crime has a look-alike!

Title: Sethum Aayiram Pon
Overview: Meeting after many years, a makeup artist and her grandmother revisit tensions from an old family feud that still hangs heavy between them.

Title: Namma Veettu Pillai
Overview: Arumpon wants his sister to get married into a good family, but is forced to accept her marriage to a local goon, with whom he is at loggerheads. Will the brother-sister relationship survive?

Title: Peranbu
Overview: A single father tries to raise his daughter, who has cerebral palsy, even as she is beginning to wake up to her sexuality.

Title: Kaappaan
Overview: A Special Protection Group officer has to identify the threat to the prime minister, who he is protecting, and also the nation.

Title: House Owner
Overview: An elderly couple, a house wife and a retired army man, go through some unanticipated moments during a rainy season in Chennai.

Title: Adithya Varma
Overview: A brilliant and short-tempered young surgeon goes down a self-destructive path when the love of his life is forced to marry another man.

Title: Kanchana 3
Overview: A young man who gets easily scared is possessed by a ghost that is seeking revenge.

Title: Game Over
Overview: Swapna, a nyctophobic game designer on a turbulent road to recovery from an incident that scarred her deeply, has to fight her inner demons to stay alive in the game called life.

Title: Kuppathu Raja
Overview: A story about the relationship between the slum dwellers in Chennai and how certain anti-social elements create unrest in their lives.

Title: Petta
Overview: A hostel warden becomes the target of a dreaded politician and his gangster son, but little do they realise that it is they who should fear him.

Title: Enai Noki Paayum Thota
Overview: A college student’s life takes an unexpected turn when he falls for an actress caught in a dangerous web of control. As their love story unfolds, he is drawn into a high-stakes world where survival becomes the ultimate challenge.

Title: Sigai
Overview: A pimp must investigate the sudden disappearance of his network’s most demanded prostitute.

Title: Sillu Karuppatti
Overview: An anthology of four romantic stories across four age groups connected by that magical thread called love.

Title: Uriyadi 2
Overview: A young man struggles for justice for the victims who are affected by the chemical plant leakage which lead to many deaths in the village.

Title: Mehandi Circus
Overview: A music shop owner falls in love with a girl from a circus troupe that visits his village, but caste and class stand in the way.
A young cop, who works in a police control room, tries to solve the mysterious case of a kidnapped girl.

Title: Dev
Overview: A youngster who has to fight against all the odds in order to achieve his desires.

Title: Kolaiyuthir Kaalam
Overview: The heiress of a multi-millionaire, a hearing and speech impaired young woman, has to fend off a slasher all alone in her palatial estate.

Title: Sangathamizhan
Overview: A village is protesting against the setting up a copper plant, but when their leader dies, the corporate company behind the plant sends in a look-alike to facilitate their plan.

Title: Dharma Prabhu
Overview: Lord Shiva accuses Yama for saving the life of a criminal-politician when the latter tries to stop a little girl from dying. Yama is given a few days' time to rectify his action.

Title: Super Deluxe
Overview: An unfaithful newly-wed wife, an estranged parent, a priest and an angry son suddenly find themselves in the most unexpected predicaments, each poised to experience their destiny, all on one fateful day.

Title: Mr. Local
Overview: A happy-go-lucky guy lands in trouble after he locks horns with an egoistic lady.

Title: Kadaram Kondan
Overview: Kadaram Kondan (Conqueror of Kadaram):  The pregnant wife of a young doctor is kidnapped and the kidnappers want him to help free a patient who is admitted in the hospital. Who is the patient? And why are the cops and criminals after him?

Title: Asuran
Overview: A family from the underprivileged class is on the run after the teenaged son kills a rich man from the upper caste. Can the pacifist father be able to save his hot-blooded son?

Title: Nerkonda Paarvai
Overview: When three young women are harassed and implicated in a crime they didn't commit, a bipolar lawyer sets out to help them clear their names and prove it to everyone that a woman's consent matters.

Title: Sagaa
Overview: Young orphans Sathya and Kadhir are raised by a local lady-goon in the dark areas of a bustling metro. They are orphaned again when she is killed by her own brother after a dispute over property. Sathya and Kadhir avenge her death, which lands them in jail. While in jail, Sathya befriends two other inmates and manages to escape with them.

Title: Action
Overview: An Indian army officer goes after the mastermind behind a terror attack that also resulted in personal loss to him.

Title: Jada
Overview: Jada is an upcoming Indian Tamil language sports drama film written and directed by Kumaran on his directorial debut. The film stars Kathir and newcomer Roshini in the lead roles, while Kishore and Yogi Babu play supporting roles.

Title: Aadai
Overview: A free-spirited girl gets the shock of her life when she finds herself naked in an abandoned building after a late-night party.

Title: Hero
Overview: A fraudster gets to fulfill his childhood dream of being a superhero when he takes on a ruthless businessman whose business strategy is to crush the dreams of children.

Title: 90 ML
Overview: Thamara, Paru, Kajal and Suganya are four friends who are rather tired of their uneventful routine. However, things take a turn for the better with the arrival of the spirited and outgoing Rita, a young woman who encourages them to live their lives to the fullest.

Title: Airaa
Overview: A young woman encounters a supernatural presence in her grandmother's home.

Title: Nungambakkam
Overview: The story based on the sensational Swathi murder case. Nungambakkam title refers to the railway station in Chennai where the 24-year-old software engineer Swathi was stabbed to death. Swathi was murdered when she was waiting for the train in the morning at the Nungambakkam railway station on June 24, 2016.

Title: Kee
Overview: A hacker gets the shock of his life when another hacker tries to destroy his dear ones.

Title: Aruvam
Overview: A food safety officer and a teacher who has no sense of smell come together to fight the practice of food adulteration and its devastating effect on people.

Title: Kaaviyyan
Overview: Akilan Vishwanathan, an Indian cop known for his intellectual mind, chases the culprit involved in a multiple kidnapping and murder in Las Vegas. Will he be able to succeed?

Title: Thambi
Overview: Brother and sister who get separated and reunite years later when the brother has grown to be a criminal.

Title: Comali
Overview: A youngster in his mid-30s goes through a series of struggles after coming to terms with the fact that he was in coma for 16 years.

Title: Natpe Thunai
Overview: Prabakaran, an international hockey player who choose to leave the sport picks it up again only to save the ground of a local team.

Title: Ayogya

Title: Karuthukalai Pathivu Sei
Overview: Karuthukalai Pathivu Sei  is a 2019 Indian Tamil-language critically acclaimed social crime thriller film directed by Rahul Paramahamsa. The film stars newcomer SSR Aryan in the male lead role and Upasana RC in the female lead role. The theme of the film is based on the challenges and issues confronted by women in the society due to social media.[1] Principal photography of the film commenced in late 2018. The film was released on 13 December 2019 and opened to mixed reviews

Ostracized by his community, Singaram tries to come to terms with his niece being a lesbian and through the process he learns to empathize with the plight of the village barber Alankaram, who is transgender.

When the interviewer feels that they do not know much about the history of jallikattu and the protests which took place, he gives them two weeks' time to learn thoroughly about the bull-taming sport. The rest of the film is their presentation about jallikattu to the interview board.

Haunted by the trauma of the war that devastated his childhood and obsessed by the flow of images on the Internet, Siva sinks into a waking dream that propels him into the heart of the battlefield.

Title: Scissors

Title: The Flowers and the Gemstones
Overview: Skanda Puranam (from mythology) tells the story of Kanyakumari who threw into the sea, the flowers and gemstones kept for her marriage with Shiva. It is said to have coloured the shores. When the last Maharaja of Travancore dynasty travelled through Kanyakumari, he was awed by the exquisite garland made of Oleander flowers and called it Manikkamalai - the ruby garland. Ever since, a family in Thovalai village of Kanyakumari has been weaving Maharaja's favourite garland every morning, to be sent to his Palace temple. The dynasty ended long ago and state borders were marked in modern India. Yet, the custom holding the two lands, in Kerala and Tamil Nadu, remains intact.

Title: My Caste
Overview: My Caste is a documentation of the experiences of people coming to learn their own caste at various intersections in their lives.  Victims of caste atrocities from different parts of the state of Tamilnadu share their violations in the hands of police, caste Hindus and men. Some of the stories are brutal, some are subtle and some are psychological and all are violent.

Title: Dharala Prabhu

All, except for One person, who vows to make his son a cop one day, despite troubles from supernatural forces..

As his day unfolds we find him to be a nimble romantic, marshalling a love of love, song, children, friendship, and even God to rise into something resembling a life well lived. But the increasing communal bigotry has other plans.

Title: Naadodigal 2

Title: Cocktail
Overview: A group of idol thieves find themselves in a tricky situation involving a priceless Murugan statue and a Cockatiel bird.

Title: Meendum Oru Mariyathai
Overview: A girl who decides to commit suicide owing to personal issues befriends a septuagenarian who has been abandoned by his son. A 10-day trip to an exotic place changes their respective lives.

Title: Insight
Overview: A young man who feels empty and numb inside, steps out of his house one night, an unforeseen chain of events elucidates in him the true perspective of life.

Title: Why do flowers die
Overview: A young boy living with his grandparents tries to overcome the tragic death of his parents.

Title: Oru Pakka Kathai
Overview: A young couple, Meera and Saravanan, are all set to get married after their parents approve of their long-standing love. But all hell breaks loose when Meera reveals a secret.

Title: Kanni Raasi
Overview: The film is about the protagonist's aversion to a love marriage, that is not shared by the heroine, his neighbour.

Title: Dagaalty
Overview: A conman tries to save an innocent girl from the clutches of a womanizer after realizing that he had fallen in love with her.

Title: Naanga Romba Busy
Overview: An honest policeman, a con man, and a hopeless romantic form an unusual team during the days of demonetization to pull off a scam that quickly goes haywire.

Title: Walter
Overview: ASP Walter IPS, who plays the titular role as a cop, gets the mandatory, yet routine hero introduction scene when a protest turns violent in Kumbakonam. Later, he takes up the case of a couple who seeks his help to find their newborn baby. Walter suspects foul play when he comes across similar cases, and sets out to investigate the crimes, accompanied by his subordinate Paneerselvam. Meanwhile, the ego clash between Eshwaramoorthi, a leading politician in the town, and Bala, who is considered to be his successor, intensifies. Their ego clash brings Balu's friend Arjun, who is linked to the kids who have gone missing, into the picture. How Walter faces several odds in his attempt to nab a criminal syndicate forms the rest of the story.

Title: Biskoth
Overview: The son of a biscuit maker grows up as a worker in the company that his dead father founded. One say, a guardian angel walks into his life, and tells him stories that change his life for the better.

Title: Putham Pudhu Kaalai
Overview: Putham Pudhu Kaalai brings together 5 of the most celebrated directors in Tamil cinema - Sudha Kongara, Gautham Menon, Suhasini Mani Ratman, Rajiv Menon, and Karthik Subbaraj to create Amazon Prime Video's first Indian anthology film.

Title: Galtha
Overview: After the dumping of waste in their area causes the death of many due to mosquitoes and unknown viruses, a brave individual steps up to fight against the system and incite a change for the well-being of his people.

Title: Indha Nilai Maarum
Overview: Indha Nilai Maarum (English: This situation will change) is a 2020 Tamil-language thriller film directed by Arunkanth V in his directorial debut. The film features Ashwin Kumar Lakshmikanthan, Ramkumar and Nivedhithaa Sathish in the lead roles.

Title: Kanni Maadam
Overview: Kanni Maadam will define “What is called MADRAS?”

Title: Penguin
Overview: Rhythm, a pregnant woman, is traumatised by nightmares about the unsolved kidnapping of her first child, Ajay. Soon, she embarks on a harrowing mission to solve the mystery of Ajay's disappearance.

Title: Maayanadhi
Overview: A doting father and her daughter, who aspires to become a doctor.

Title: Mamakiki
Overview: MaMaKiKi is a film about four friends who studied together in college. They meet at a reunion in college after 5 years of graduation. What has happened in everyone's lives in the 5 years forms the structure of the film.

Title: Draupathi
Overview: A man who is accused of killing his wife and her sister on the basis of casteism goes on a rampage to kill those who cheat upper-caste women in the pretense of having a romantic relationship.

Title: Irandam Kuththu
Overview: Two friends who are taken for gays all their lives marry two girls and go to a resort in Bangkok for their honeymoons, where a horny ghost who won't let them in peace until they satisfy it sexually.

Title: Gypsy
Overview: A young man travels across India and on his way he learns about the issues connected to nation-wide politics which urges him to do something about it.

Title: Pattas
Overview: A petty thief learns about his father's illustrious legacy and decides to attack the man who murdered him in order to bring the ancient martial art form that his father had practiced to limelight.

Title: Seeru
Overview: A guy from a small-town takes on a ruthless criminal lawyer for his friend and sister(s).

Title: Paramapatham
Overview: The fantasy game board adventure story of 4 friends and the how the game is start affect their daily lives.

Title: College Kumar
Overview: A father who works as a peon in an office strives to ensure that his son fulfils his dreams. Later, his son falls in love with a girl and starts to rebel against his father.

Title: Utraan
Overview: Revolving around a college romance, Utraan tells the story of students whose lives turn upside down after a certain incident. Vijay gets into a series of life-threatening troubles because of his love with Nandini.

Title: Andava Kaanom
Overview: A woman loses her 'Andaa' creates a huge ruckus in the entire village until she finds the precious vessel that belongs to her.

Title: Thunivu
Overview: A short film depicts a woman who struggles to survive in an unfamiliar world and initially tries to commit suicide. However, she eventually meets someone who guides her and later she discovers a purpose in life.

Title: Ettu Thikkum Para
Overview: Ambedkar, a social activist, gets involved in the dark side of the government. As a result, his son and friends are killed. A lower caste individual desires to marry a girl from a higher caste. A woman leaves for Chennai to marry the man of her choice. A man is in need of Rs 20,000 to save his son's life. How these separate stories interact forms the rest of the story.

Title: Lockup
Overview: The mysterious death of a cop becomes complex as investigation progresses because of fabricated evidences and indirect involvement of a few other cops in the case.

Title: Quota
Overview: Film relates the situation faced by an ambitious, loyal and happy family in their daily walks of financially uncontrollable lifestyle. Adding much to the movement of the story, the pinching of the boys with acute sense of humor lifts it to a different level. The difference in opportunities, opinions, judgements, reservations between the rich and poor forces the boy to challenge his talent which results in attaining the prejudice with his determination and hard work.

Title: AASPATHIRI
Overview: RAJU IS A GUY NEW TO THE TOWN AND HE SEARCH FOR A HOSPITAL WITH A  HELP OF ONE OLD STRANGE LADY .THEN HE REACHED AND SPEND TIME IN THAT WIERDEST HOPSITAL.

Title: Dhowlath
Overview: A drama film directed by Sakthi Sivan, starring Reshmi Gautham and Sakthi Sivan in the lead roles.

Title: Karthik Dial Seytha Yenn
Overview: A sequel to his Vinnaithaandi Varuvaayaa (2010), it stars Silambarasan and Trisha reprising their roles from that film.

Title: Enthiran Spoof
Overview: DR.VASIGARAN CREATES A ROBOT "CHITTI" , AFTER THAT DR.BORA RE-CREATES CHIITTI AS A EVIL "ROBOT".

Title: Miya
Overview: An aborted child's ghost takes revenge!

Title: Patra Vaitha Nerupondru
Overview: Revolves around the murder of a delivery boy. And more murders happen. After some serious probing, it is suspected that a huge mafia network behind these murders. How the culprits are tracked down is the rest of the movie.

Title: Velvet Nagaram
Overview: Two women go down the rabbit hole to investigate the murder of their best friend and solve the mystery behind her death.

Title: Asuraguru
Overview: A clever thief who gets away easily is being lured into a bigger trap where the police force sets up an attractive bait to capture him for good.

Title: The Nightmare
Overview: A heartbroken young lady battles sinister urges and accidentally attracts Death.

Title: Thatrom Thookrom
Overview: The story revolves around three smart boys who determines to outwit the villain and make their dream of becoming rich come alive.

Title: Kavalthurai Ungal Nanban
Overview: A terrible series of events occur when a public employee unexpectedly enters a police station.

Title: God Father
Overview: Godfather is a Tamil action movie, directed by Jegan Rajshekar. The cast of Godfather includes Natarajan Subramaniam,Lal.

Title: Pachai Vilakku
Overview: Ashwin Kumar (Maran) is a professor and a PhD holder in road safety. He also works as a part-time traffic warden in tandem with cop Vijay (Imman Annachi) to create road safety awareness.

Title: Sinamkol
Overview: Oppression of the Tamil people continues even after the end of Sri Lanka's civil war.

Title: Yaadhumagi Nindraai
Overview: This is based on several true stories that happen in the daily lives of background dancers. This is the first film in Tamil to give an insight into the lives of the background dancers and the dreams and aspirations they cherish. The film follows the story of a young school going girl, forced to take up dancing to make the ends meet for her family. Her dreams and aspirations are simple, but the realities of life is a lot more harsh than what one can imagine. This is a story that travels over 2 decades of the life of one such dancer Thamarai and the various people she meets and travels with. This is a story of hope, it's a story of a young girl, it's a story that has to be experienced to be cherished. It's a story that stays with you for a long time.

Title: Adavi
Overview: A tribe in a mountain tries to save their land from a greedy estate owner.

Title: Karuppankaatu Valasu
Overview: A village that is being modernised by the efforts of the chieftain's daughter is rocked by a series of mysterious murders.

Title: Kadathal Kaaran
Overview: A bride was captured by the people of the village who share the stolen things equally. Having shared the bride's jewels evenly, they're also thinking about sharing the bride. How the bride's boyfriend saves her from this chaos forms the crux of the story.

Title: Athaiyum Thaandi
Overview: Directed by Vikinish Lokarag Asokan, this romantic drama film stars Vemanna Appannah, Yuvaraj Krishnasamy, Vanessa Cruez and Sathis Rao Chinniah.

Title: Danny
Overview: After the police inspector Kunthavai picks up a complex murder case for investigation, she takes the help of Danny, a smart police dog, to unearth a gang of dangerous criminals involved in serial killing

Title: Day Knight
Overview: A train robbery happened between Salem and Chennai and two years later the money travels from India to Australia.

Title: Yours Truly
Overview: Story revolves around the perspective of the protagonist and his thoughts on his relationships and the society.

Title: The Tremor
Overview: A rookie photojournalist sets off to report on a massive earthquake that has allegedly destroyed an entire village. Being his first major assignment, he is anxious to reach the disaster site before anybody else. But soon, he finds himself lost in the desolate mountains amidst uncanny locals with cryptic clues that do not match the disaster he was craving to witness.

Title: Sandimuni
Overview: When the hero is in love with a ghost and some hilarious sequences turn the entire film a fun filled ghost ride.

Title: Marijuana
Overview: Marijuana is a Tamil movie released on 13 Mar, 2020. The movie is directed by MD Anand and featured Rishi Rithvik, Asha Parithalom and Powerstar Seenivasan as lead characters.

Title: ENPA
Overview: Akilan who afraid to talk with his father about failed marks scored in exam , how Akilan is faced this problem with his father and his crazy brother Mukilan .

Title: Alti
Overview: Alti is a Tamil movie directed by MJ Hussain and featured Anbu Mayilsamy, Manisha Jith, Sendrayan and Pasanga Sivakumar as lead characters.

Title: En Sangathu Aala Adichavan Evanda
Overview: A comedy film directed by Naveen Manikandan, starring Vikkas, Madhumitha, Ramar and Rahul Thatha in the lead roles.

Title: Dopamine : A reason For Addiction
Overview: Dopamine is Film based on Addiction

Title: Irumbu Manithan
Overview: An action film directed by Disney, starring Santhosh Prathap, Ganja Karuppu and Anitha Sampath in the lead roles.

Title: Battle of the Hearts
Overview: Called to negotiate with a man who has taken a hospital ward hostage, an ex-army major is shocked to learn of the attacker’s link to his own past.

Title: First Vacation
Overview: A migrant worker stays in a hotel for the first time in his life - except it isn’t really a vacation for him.

Title: Kaalam Maari Pochu
Overview: Vasu's birthday surprises catch everyone off-guard.

Title: Athigaari
Overview: Tasked with finding out the truth behind his fellow colleague's death, a police officer begins by reviewing his previous cases. Slowly, he traces the steps of the murderer until he discovers the killer's master plan.

Title: Routtu
Overview: A story of a man trying to save a child life with 200,000 rupees at a private hospital. Many challenges come in his way and many obstacle and a story of a woman trying to save her life from a man he didn't love and from acid.

Title: B.Selvi & Daughters
Overview: B. Selvi & Daughters is the story of Selvi, a 50-year old woman in Chennai, India who is trying to get her fledgling online saree store off the ground. Like any Good Indian Mother, Selvi gave up her career aspirations for family life, and left all major decisions to her husband. Now, a year after his death, Selvi has taken her hobby of selling sarees door-to-door to the next level via Whatsapp, and is struggling with the confidence to build it into a real business. When Kavitha - Selvi's fiercely independent, idealistic daughter comes home for Pongal - she discovers her mother's secret with pleasant surprise, and runs an ad for the sari business without consulting her. Now, with close to a hundred orders to fulfill overnight, Selvi is overwhelmed. Can she do this? Is she capable of handling a business on her own? She needs to take the plunge in order to find out.

Title: Pizhai
Overview: Three naughty kids hailing from poor families feel earning money is more important than studying. Time makes them realize the importance of education in life.

Title: Thadayam Mudhal Adhyayam
Overview: One of the crime scene turns out to be intriguing for the cop Mathivaanan which links to the series of previous murders with same pattern in the town. Further probing leads him into psychological distress before he gets his eyes on the devil for the intelligent battle.

Title: Kadhal Ondru Kanden
Overview: A Romantic Comedy Short Movie with lots of mixed emotions.

Title: Yen Peyar Anandhan
Overview: A short-filmmaker who is about to begin the shoot of his debut feature film gets kidnapped. What do the kidnappers want?

Title: The Mirage of Dragonfly
Overview: Anbu a young writer deals with his own problems. Lack of external support and making himself socially isolated he gets into a mental illness which he can’t deal with anymore. Being avoided by his close friend and getting hurt by an extramarital affair, he takes an important decision to save him.

Title: Onbathu Kuzhi Sampath
Overview: An angry extrovert hunk falls in love with a introvert village belle, and their love is tested with family pride and honour.

Title: Kayiru
Overview: A man goes with his cow to foretell the fortunes and fate of the people's home that he visits happens to fall in love with a local woman which stirs up a lot of trouble for them.

Title: Biya
Overview: 5 college friends plan to go into the mystery forest near the border of Kerala and Tamil Nadu and take a documentary. Those who went into the forest goes missing and the remaining friends for help from someone who had already survived that woods.

Title: Santhittha Naal Muthal
Overview: The movie is about a love story between the main characters, Tamil and Mozhi. This story begins from their first encounter in their high school years till their adulthood. The movie illustrates how their relationships are coping with different challenges over time.

Title: ஆடி / Mirror
Overview: A film is about a mirror in my house. About its beauty and its pride. How its sees other things and humans.

Title: Hawala
Overview: A underworld gangster based action movie which revolves around main 2 characters, one named Muscal Bhai, is a 9 killer by profession and the other one named Naama a local goon living on hafta vasool and local rowdism who is ambitious to become a don one day... These 2 characters meet and become friends who later on get involved in hawala business and attract rivalry with a don by name Rana who is ruthless... What happens next is the climax of the movie.

Title: Soodu
Overview: a 2020 tamil film

Title: Chiyaangal
Overview: Set against the backdrops of Meghamalai foothills in Theni, the story revolves around 7 aged persons, whose life is laden with nothing but disappointments. They are forsaken by their families, rejected off their needs. They’re left with nothing and are almost in a walking dead stage.

Title: Password
Overview: An IT employee is kidnapped to a secluded room and his legs are locked in an immovable chair. Along him in the room is a dead body and a laptop with an internet connection.

Title: Kanya
Overview: A coming-of-age, drama about an adolescent girl growing up between the values of occidental and traditional cultures, whose aspirations of becoming a competitive swimmer takes an unexpected turn when she gets her first period.

Title: Virus Mairus
Overview: When Neelakandan needs a drink, he will get it no matter what. The short film follows his struggle of trying to score some alcohol amidst the MCO in Malaysia due to the recent outbreak of the Covid-19 virus.

Title: The Girl with the Red Ribbons
Overview: Viru secretly envies her best friend Bhanu for her beautiful hair. And her mother refuses to buy her at least new red ribbons. Then Viru is humiliated in front of the entire class when she discovers a strange bloodstain of her first periods on the uniform. Can Bhanu save her friend?

Title: Coffee Cafe
Overview: This film features four stories of four characters connected to each other. Vinothini an independent divorcee runs a coffee café and creates modern plays based on the street play 'Therukoothu. Kaveri, a 40-year-old transgender works at the coffee shop as housekeeping. Senthil an independent filmmaker who struggles for his debut film is in a financial crisis. Pooja, a freaky girl wants to live life on her terms and on one particular night, an incident makes them all connect which one leads the plot.

Title: Grace
Overview: Can a Trans woman reimagine the world before her, without a fight for her rights, acceptance in the society and equal opportunity? A documentary short about a young trans woman, seeking a dignified life for her and her community.

Title: Unakkagathane
Overview: Rishi and Shan is very close friend since childhood. After grown up both of them involved in same business as property consultant. Shan fall in love with Nisha, his friend from college and spent time with her. Shan really trusted Rishi and let him deal the biggest land sale. Rishi become greedy and try to cheat Shan with huge amount of commissions which belongs to Shan.Shan is very upset and angry with what have done by Rishi but he never take any action thinking both of them are very close friend since small age.One day one guy was shot dead by police in struggle, who involved in drugs shipments. Brother of dead person known as K7, who is leader of the international syndicate which is most wanted by police.When Rishi collide with K7,he wanted to killed and take revenge.

Title: Pulikodi Devan
Overview: A casteist father kills his daughter, as she fell in love with a low caste boy. The lover, who finds out that his lady love is dead, becomes mentally ill. Similarly, a high caste biggie’s sister falls for a low caste boy. The casteist brother doesn’t want their relationship to continue.

Title: Footwear
Overview: Inspired by Cultural Medallion Recipient KTM Iqbal’s poem “Irataiyar” (Twins), this film follows the protagonist on the morning of a crucial job interview. Will he make it in time?

Title: Tamani
Overview: A police officer is investigating the case of a missing girl when he finds a gold chain. Investigations related to the gold chain led to the discovery of several violent crimes in which a boy was killed in a robbery, another boy was killed by a group of bullying teenagers and a transgender individual was injured in an acid attack.

Title: Thedu
Overview: Thedu revolves around a drunkard, another obsessed with selfies and a lover couple. The repercussions they face and how they overcome it forms the crux.

Title: Paakaati Po
Overview: Without telling his colleague, Mythily, of his true feelings, Ashwin, who fell in love with her the first time they met, manages to attract her attention. But when their new colleague, Jessy, enters their relationship, forming a love triangle, Mythily becomes jealous. The three of them must learn how to deal with their feelings, and each other, in order to fulfill their destinies.

Title: Jai Bhim

Title: Sinam
Overview: She was forced into prostitution. She is considered less than human. She is full of anger. Now she recounts her brutal life story to a documentary filmmaker.

Title: Annaatthe
Overview: Kaaliyan is a village president in the Madurai district, who is fondly called Annaatthe. His nieces compete with each other to marry him. But, he falls in love with another woman who visits their village. Kaaliyan has a sister who gets married and shifts to Kolkata where she faces some unknown threats. Soon, her brother comes to her aid.

Title: Udanpirappe
Overview: A woman hopes for the reunion of two families caught in the ideological battle between her righteous but hot-headed brother and her law-abiding husband.

Title: Kamali from Nadukkaveri

She is a weak student who is hardly interested in studies when she falls in love with a studious boy in Chennai who aspires to make it to IIT Madras. She decides to take her studies seriously and convinces her father to go for higher studies. With the help of a retired professor in her village, she starts preparing for exams to join IIT Madras if only to meet her love.

Title: Amanuda Bhayam
Overview: This film shows the research project of a parapsychology student named Abdul who visits a haunted forest with his friend Subramani.

Title: Mughizh
Overview: A girl who is scared of dogs gets a puppy, which helps her overcome her fear, and teaches her about life and loss.

Title: Nenjam Marappathillai
Overview: A god-fearing young woman who takes up the job of a caretaker in a rich household tries to take revenge on her lustful employer.

Title: Kadaseela Biriyani
Overview: A studious teen who wants a simple life is conned by his violent older brothers into joining their grandiose plan to avenge their murdered father.

Title: Master
Overview: An alcoholic professor is sent to a juvenile school, where he clashes with a gangster, who uses the children of the school for criminal activities.

Title: Jagame Thandhiram

Title: Pulikkuthi Pandi
Overview: A ruthless youngster becomes a kind and humble husband for his wife but as fate turns brutal, his patience is tested.

Title: Tamil Rockers
Overview: 4 Major characters running for the Money facing more challenges by forgetting the fact that it's not the decision of money to reach human.

Title: Sarpatta Parambarai
Overview: When Sarpatta Parambarai is challenged to a do-or-die match, Kabilan, a young labourer, must choose whether to put on the gloves himself and lead his clan to victory, or be dissuaded by his disapproving mother and dangerous politics.

Title: Teddy
Overview: A youngster with OCD sets out to save a girl from the clutches of an international medical mafia with the help of a teddy bear which behaves like humans.

Title: Sangathalaivan
Overview: A socialist takes on a ruthless factory owner after the latter murders his former employee.

Title: Thai Nilam
Overview: A father and his daughter came to India as refugees post-war in their country. Few good hands help them to rebuild their lifestyle.

Title: Doctor
Overview: An army doctor helps his love interest's family to find their kidnapped daughter.

Title: Annabelle Sethupathi
Overview: A scary journey begins when a small-time thief, Rudra, enters a haunted castle and gets pulled into the mystery of its mistress — Annabelle Sethupathi.

Title: Chakra
Overview: An army man takes over his cop girlfriend's investigation of a multiple robberies committed by the same team to recover his late father's Paramvir Chakra medal.

Title: Karnan
Overview: Karnan, an angry young man, fights for the rights of his oppressed people. Can he save them from those who wield power and weapons?

Title: Sulthan
Overview: A man raised by gangsters tries to reform them, and a hired job to protect a village presents him with the perfect opportunity.

Title: Thalaivii
Overview: The biopic charts the life of actor-turned-chief minister J. Jayalalitha and the relationship paving her rapid yet complicated path to power, who served five terms as the Chief Minister for the Indian state of Tamil Nadu.

Title: Vanakkamda Mappilei
Overview: Aravind, a mariner who enjoys a happy life by working six months on the sea and six months on land. Later on, he falls in love with a girl named Thulasi, who doesn’t reciprocate his love. Eventually, after a lot of hardships, love finally starts to begin between them but an incident from Aravind’s past becomes a troublemaker in his new relationship with Thulasi.

Title: Kutty Story
Overview: An anthology of four stories that revolve around man-woman relationships.

Title: Maara
Overview: When Paaru sees a fairy tale she heard from from a stranger as a child painted across the walls of a costal town, she goes in search of the man who painted it - Maara.

Title: Laabam
Overview: The president of a farmers' association wants to set up a community farming initiative and takes on a big shot, who wants to destroy his plans so that he can start a bio-diesel project on the land.

Title: Maanaadu
Overview: A Muslim man, who is stuck in a time loop, has to stop a political rally from taking place in order to save the state's chief minister and prevent religious violence.

Title: Sarbath
Overview: Arivu travels to attend his brother's wedding, only to discover that it has been cancelled. However, trouble ensues when he falls for a woman who turns out to the one who was engaged to his brother.

Title: Bachelor
Overview: A carefree young man gets into a live-in relationship with his colleague, and gets her pregnant. What happens next?

Title: Thaen
Overview: A naive and uneducated youngster, who earns living by beekeeping in a forest, gets the shock of his life when his wife is diagnosed with a rare disease. The lack of documents to prove his identity makes things worse for him

Title: Kasada Thapara
Overview: The lives of a few individuals get impacted, both in good and bad ways, by the actions of others who are hardly connected to them.

Title: Kodiyil Oruvan
Overview: An IAS aspirant, who lands in Chennai to fulfill his mother's wish, gets into trouble with a local councillor and his men, leading to a power struggle.

Title: Kabadadaari
Overview: An ambitious traffic cop sets out to solve a murder which took place four decades ago with the help of a journalist and a retired cop.

Title: Pebbles
Overview: A young boy follows his violent and alcoholic father on a quest to find his mother, who has run away from his abuse.

Title: Chithirai Sevvaanam
Overview: Muthupandi is in search of Aishwarya, his teenage daughter, who goes missing after her private video gets leaked online. Can the innocent father trace his daughter, and identify the culprits responsible for putting him in this situation?

Title: Bhoomi
Overview: Bhoominathan, a NASA scientist, returns to his drought-affected village in Tamil Nadu and decides to fight against the evil corporates and corrupt politicians responsible for the plight of his people.

Title: Mandela
Overview: An underprivileged hairdresser becomes the game changer in a local body election in a village where caste politics rules the roost. Will he be able to bring some changes to people's lives?

Title: Aranmanai 3
Overview: The ghost of a wronged mother tries to take revenge on a Zamindar and his daughter, but one man stands in its way!

Title: Aelay
Overview: An embittered son returns to his native village to perform the final rites of his dead father.

Title: Vanam
Overview: An art college student tries to find the reasons behind the mysterious deaths of the people who have stayed in a hostel room, with help from a documentary filmmaker.

Title: Enemy
Overview: Two childhood friends end up on opposite extremes of morality, and face each other in a good vs evil war.

Title: Chasing
Overview: A cop from Chennai sets out to nab a dreaded drug racket based out of Malaysia.

Title: IPC 376
Overview: A Lady cop is dealing with the mysterious disappearances of girls and burning issue , rapes.

Title: Pallavi Bakery
Overview: Pallavi is an independent woman who had struggling childhood and after so much of struggle she owned a Bakery (Pallavi Bakery) Adithya, a spoiled brat requested to work as her waiter in the bakery since he is not good in cooking. Eventually, both started to fall in love. Things goes well until Parvathi came into their life. Parvathi tries to manipulate Pallavi to get her secret recipe. She also creates a lot of misunderstanding between the people who is very attached with Pallavi. Will Parvathy get the secret recipe from Pallavi? How will Pallavi knows the truth? Will Pallavi and Adithya gets together?

Title: Rudra Thandavam
Overview: Rudran, a fearless cop who battles against drug mafia, gets trapped in a PCR (Protection of Civil Rights) case, unfortunately. Will he prove himself innocent?

Title: Rajavamsam
Overview: A young man, amidst a prestigious project in his IT firm, goes to his village to visit his family and meet his future bride. However, he learns that she is in love with his relative.

Title: Pulvaaliraghu
Overview: The fan's self-sacrificing blades dance in the air, generating a refreshing breeze that wipes away the sweat of others and brings solace on a scorching day.

Title: Filter Gold
Overview: Viji, Dora and Shanthi are transgenders, and Viji and Dora live together. When Viji’s best friend Shanthi is murdered, she decides to take revenge. At the same time, Dora falls in love with Aasari’s son. Now, Viji has feels the responsibility to protect Dora from Aasari.

Title: Anandham Vilayadum Veedu
Overview: Two half-brothers decide to build a house in which they can live together with their respective brothers and families, but an evil man plots to create a rift between the families.

Title: MGR Magan
Overview: The Normal life of a villager turns living hell when he starts to realizes that is family keeps boundaries to it's members and also discovers that his village is in danger by a man who tries to destroy a mountain in the village.

Title: Thalli Pogathey
Overview: A woman invites her ex-lover, to spend 10 days with her and her husband to show that she is actually leading a happy life.

Title: Velan
Overview: A carefree young man agrees to marry a girl not realising that a mix-up has taken place and she isn't the one who he is wooing. He teams up with the guy who loves the girl and tries to set things right, but can he do so without embarrassing his father?

Title: Sivakumarin Sabadham

Thus, the non living entity becomes a living one among the family members by the memories itched by it in their minds.The screenplay is based on how the antique cot , which the family emotionally revere lose it and how they struggle to recover the same , whether they succeed or lose it forever ,is the question which is answered in the plot.

For rape, one I would say let's see what true story has to do with a ritual.  who is affected by this ritual & Nisharin Saif who plays.  Writer Bala comes home to Nishar's Saif home. Saif by writer Bala Nishar asks about life. Nishar's Saif begins to tell about their lives. Bala pays close attention to it and asks Nishar's Saif, Bala when a ceremony like this takes place do you want to ask the girl for consent? Bala asks, "Isn't it?" Nishar's Saif answers. Armed with 40-year-old maps of the area and a GPS device, he must navigate the park on foot and he recruits a local tribesman from the area - Dorai, to serve as his guide. The severity of the task immediately becomes apparent to Dhruv. Aside from the physical challenge posed, he struggles with his wayward assistant. Not only is Dorai addicted to alcohol, but he also appears to be terrified of officials and uniforms. Through the course of their journey, however, the two forge an unlikely friendship and a relationship between equals. When an accident takes him to Dorai's village, the wool of 'civilisation' is lifted from Dhruv's eyes and his attitudes towards the marginalised are transformed.

Overview: Irfan, an innocent Muslim chemical engineer with an ordinary life, is caught in inexplicable circumstances, when accused of being a most-wanted terrorist, that alter his life & everyone around him.

Title: The Elephant Whisperers
Overview: Bomman and Bellie, a couple in south India, devote their lives to caring for an orphaned baby elephant named Raghu, forging a family like no other.

Title: Maaran
Overview: An investigative journalist gets into trouble when he publishes an article that exposes bitter truths about a corrupt politician.

Title: Raangi
Overview: Thaiyal Nayagi, a journalist from Chennai, happens to connect with a terrorist in Tunisia through a fake account in the name of her 16-year-old cousin, Sushmitha. Little she knew that this would put herself and her cousin in danger.

Title: Sardar
Overview: An espionage agent who is branded a traitor returns from exile to take down a dubious water project and safeguard the country.

Title: Kuruthi Aattam
Overview: Shakthi, an attender in government hospital wins the friendship of Muthu, a son of kingpin in Madurai. His sudden death forces him to take revenge on the culprits who were responsible for the same.

Title: Maayon
Overview: An archaeology team lead by Arjun Manimaran a curious and intelligent man, is on a quest to break down the myths of an ancient temple, which might put their lives at risk, whilst their work continues other conflict arises which threatens to destroy the temple's relics and antiquity.

Title: Koogle Kuttappa
Overview: A curmudgeonly, very conservative old man gets a robot as a caretaker and becomes very attached to it. Can his robotic engineer son make him realise the danger posed by the machine before it is too late?

Title: My Dear Bootham
Overview: A boy with stammering frees a genie, who helps him deal with his issues, but can he, given his speech disorder, grant the latter's one wish?

Title: Gargi
Overview: When a schoolteacher's father is arrested for the rape of a 10-year-old girl, the media storm surrounding the case has lawyers reluctant about defending the accused. An inexperienced advocate with a speech disability agrees to take up the case despite the stiff opposition and ridicule from his association. It is now up to them to build their defence and prove that the man accused of committing the crime did not do it.

Title: Captain
Overview: A team of soldiers, led by a brave army captain, takes up a dangerous mission to go into a restricted forest area and uncover the mystery behind the unexplainable deaths of previous teams that had visited the site.

Title: Viruman
Overview: An intrepid and good-hearted son fights to make his arrogant father pay the price for his sins, which includes his mother's death, and save his brothers from the man's grip.

Title: D Block
Overview: A young engineering student along with his friends unravels the mystery around his college where several girls go missing and dead.

Title: The Legend
Overview: A scientist is spurred by the death of his friend to find a cure for diabetes, but can he take on the might of the pharma mafia and succeed in his mission?

Title: Driver Jamuna
Overview: Jamuna, a cab driver, finds herself in trouble when three contract killers get in for a ride. Can she save herself from this horrific situation?

Title: Payanigal Gavanikkavum
Overview: After spending two sleepless nights taking care of his sick daughter, Ezhilan, a person with hearing and speech disability falls asleep in a metro. A Social Media Addict captures this moment and uploads it on social media with a caption saying 'Drunkard On A Public Transport'.

Title: Vendhu Thanindhathu Kaadu
Overview: A youngster from Tamil Nadu goes to Bombay in search of a better life and gets sucked into the underworld. Will he be able to find a way out of the violence and bloodshed?

Title: Anbarivu
Overview: Separated twins, Anbu and Arivu have been brought up in two worlds, one which is filled with blood stain and revenge and the other is filled with Wisdom and Peace. Anbu and Arivu are forced to switch from their worlds to reunite their estranged family.

Title: Prince
Overview: A happy-go-lucky teacher finds himself falling in love with a British woman who is teaching English at the same school. He tries to woo her, but given that his grandfather was a freedom fighter, can he convince his father of the match?

Title: Varalaru Mukkiyam
Overview: Karthik is an aspiring YouTuber, who wants to be famous and his friend Adaikalam aspires to be a politician. Karthik falls in love with Yamuna, his new Malayali neighbour but Jamuna, sister of his love interest falls in love with Karthik.

Title: Maha
Overview: A mother who loses her child to psycho killer's killing spree goes in search for answers

Title: Naane Varuvean
Overview: A father finds out that his teenager daughter is possessed, and the only way he can save her is by doing the ghost's bidding, which will mean an encounter with his long-separated twin - who happens to be a psycho killer.

Title: Jiivi 2
Overview: Saravanan restarts his life by marrying Kavitha, the daughter of his house owner, and takes up the job of a share-auto driver. As Mani, his friend, comes back into his life, the cycle of events start again putting Saravanan's life in a challenging situation.

Title: Idiot
Overview: The descendants of two men who betrayed a royal family centuries ago are caught up in events that involve ghosts, revenge and kidnapping.

Title: Veerame Vaagai Soodum
Overview: Following his sister's strange death, a hot-headed police aspirant begins his investigation for the true cause of his sister's death. During this time, he meets a ruthless entrepreneur named Nedunchezhiyan. What is the connection between Nedunchezhiyan and his sister's tragedy?

Title: Kombu Vatcha Singamda
Overview: Six friends, who follow Periyaar's ideologies, fall prey to the local caste politics that happens in their hometown. Who is the reason behind this and what happens after?

Title: EVIL
Overview: Film starts with anbu, he dreams a bad visual which he gets regularly in his dreams, so to understand about the nightmare he plans a trip with his Girlfriend Pavithra and along with roommate Harish to  visit a haunted Church. After entering to the church They experience spooky incidents in the haunted Church.

Title: Visithiran
Overview: Following the death of his ex-wife, a retired police officer, who is known for his investigative prowess, unexpectedly gets pulled into a criminal case involving organ harvesting.

Title: Connect
Overview: The announcement of a nation-wide lock-down due to the spread of COVID-19 pandemic disrupts the peace of a family. What follows is a series of bizarre events as one of them tries to invite the spirit of a family member.

Title: Grandma
Overview: A small girl keeps talking to the spirit of her dead grandmother. When her private tutor finds out about this, she sets out to help the girl and the spirit.

Title: Iravin Nizhal
Overview: A man on the run looks back on his crime-filled life, the people who have shaped it up, his sins and his one last hope at redemption.

Title: Panni Kutty
Overview: A down-on-luck man has to run over a piglet that had caused a minor accident to get lucky in life. But the animal belongs to a man who has to keep it safe for his wedding to happen!

Title: Hostel
Overview: A girl gets trapped inside a boys' hostel, which is under surveillance of a strict warden. Why has she entered the place and what happens next?

Title: Coffee With Kadhal
Overview: Kathir's wedding brings together his two brothers and their reunion causes them to have second thoughts about their current love lives. Will each of them end up with who they want to be with?

Title: Yugi
Overview: A detective, along with his team and with help of a suspended Police Sub-Inspector, goes in search of a missing girl, Karthika. What follows is shocking revelations about Karthika, who became the victim of power and economic exploitation.

Title: Battery
Overview: Pugazh, a rookie cop earns an immediate disliking from his higher official Inspector Rathnam because of his brilliance in handling the case. Inspector Rathnam is killed by a masked man who shoves expired batteries into his mouth.  A medical industrialist is also done away in the same way. Who is the murderer using the unusual method and why he is doing it and whether he gets caught or not?

Title: Kuthiraivaal
Overview: A man wakes up from a strange dream with a horse tail attached to his body and begins a mind-bending journey to disentangle the real from the imagined.

Title: Diary
Overview: A sub-inspector trainee sets out on a journey to track an unsolved, 16-year-old case. But little does he know that fate and destiny will put him on an exhilarating ride.

Title: Vattam
Overview: A tormented Mano decides to solve his problems after his break-up. But things get worse when he finds himself caught between kidnappers and a distressed couple.

Title: Coffee
Overview: A girl from a poor family, who loses her parents at a very young age, takes care of her only younger brother and It is when the future looks bright in her eyes, her life is bombarded with unexpected and shocking turn of events.

Title: The Great Man
Overview: A humble auto driver is forced to go on the run, leaving his wife and two kids behind, after being cheated by a fraudster. Will he be able to save his family.

Title: Oh My Dog
Overview: A school kid rescues a blind Siberian Husky to prove its worth to the outside world where it was neglected.

Title: Taanakkaran
Overview: A group of police recruits encounter horrific treatment at their police training school. Will they overcome the hardships or fall victims to the abusive system?

Title: Selfie
Overview: When Kanal, a B-grade engineering college student, finds out that his dad went on to pay a hefty amount as “donation” to get him the seat, the liquor-swigging student is introduced to the underground world of the admission racket system in colleges.

Title: Rajavum 5 Koojavum
Overview: A group of 6 friends plans to travel to Srilanka. The hurdles and issues faced by the gang during their journey and the secretive reason behind it forms the crux.

Title: Pattathu Arasan
Overview: Chinnadurai along with his grandfather, a Kabbadi player, try to bring justice for his brother's death. Can they trace out the real culprits or end up confronting them inside the Kabbadi court?

Title: Aadhaar
Overview: A labourer approaches the police to find his wife, who has mysteriously gone missing just a day after delivering a baby. What has happened to her, and will justice be served?

Title: Pistha
Overview: A man who specialises in stopping weddings enters a tricky situation where his own wedding faces threat.

Title: Mayathirai
Overview: A love failure guy , who is addicted to drugs and incidents that happens in his hallucinations creats an illusion of looping.

Title: Sembi
Overview: Ten-year-old Sembi and her grandmother Veerayi, an apiarist, live peacefully amidst nature in the hilly regions of Kodaikanal. They lead a beautiful life until three influential miscreants shatter all their dreams. After a tragedy the two escape and board a bus, whose Passengers from different walks of life try to help bringing justice to the duo.

Title: Pattampoochi
Overview: A murder convict facing a death sentence confesses that he is actually behind a series of unsolved murders. Can a cop with PTSD prove that he is actually telling the truth and keep his loved ones alive?

Title: Veerapandiyapuram
Overview: An orphan murders his girlfriend's father and his brothers. What made him seek out this bloody revenge?

Title: Gurumoorthi
Overview: An honest cop tries to track down a suitcase filled with ₹5 crore worth of unaccounted cash that belongs to a businessman. With at least a dozen individuals after it, can he recover it before it falls into the wrong hands?

Title: Marutha
Overview: Two families are torn apart by the custom of seimurai, practised in Madurai.

Title: Naai Sekar
Overview: Sekar who works at an IT company in Chennai gets bitten by a neighbourhood scientist's dog, and their souls swapped.

Title: Poikkal Kuthirai
Overview: For Kathiravan, who lost his left leg in an accident,his 8-year-old daughter is his world. She is diagnosed with a congenital heart problem and 7 Million INR is needed to save his daughter. Unable to raise such a huge amount, he plans to kidnap businessman Rudra's daughter.  Instead Kathir becomes embroiled in his own kidnapping plot.

Title: Drama
Overview: A senior police constable is found murdered at the police station during a brief power cut. Investigating officer Arjun takes the task of unmasking the killer from a handful of suspects including half a dozen cops and  a number of outsiders who are there for various reasons.

Title: Jothi
Overview: A pregnant woman's baby is stolen from her womb. Can a cop find the culprits behind such a heinous crime?

Title: Kuttram Kuttrame
Overview: Kokila, a village girl and grieving mother, commits suicide and the investigation for this crime falls on two police officers, Nattraayan and Retired DSP Muthukaruppan.

Title: Aattral
Overview: A mechanical engineer has an aim of inventing unmanned car and his father manages to get money required for project, but dies in a road accident.  A robbery attempt stopped by him leads him to the suspicion about his father's death.He sets out to find the truth with his unmanned car named Roger.

Title: Repeat Shoe
Overview: A crew involved in child sex trafficking who kidnaps girl children, abusing them and torturing those who does not comply. These girls feeling trapped and having no way out are in desperation. After many experimentation a scientist successfully end up making a Time Travelling Shoe. While testing it he gets arrested by police, so he ends up hiding invention in a safer place.

Title: Bestie
Overview: A couple on a date at a beach resort experiences strange events and the incidents repeat again as they get stuck in a time loop of sorts.

Title: Sivi 2
Overview: A group of you-tubers exploring a haunted asylum have to face the wrath of ghost existing there for years.

Title: Therkathi Veeran
Overview: Saarath, a rich, upright and helpful youth, concerned about the welfare of coastal fishermen of his area, takes care of their problems with his friends. His actions rewards not only the love of his life, but also a long list of enemies.  At one point,Saarath's enemies get together and kill one of his friends and frame him for the murder and implicate the police. Can Saarath able to prove his innocence and recover from the crime of murder?

Title: Powder
Overview: A tale of five breathtaking and ravaging events occurring in one night. Samy murdering the man who cheated his daughter; A bunch of youngsters murder a local politician, butcher and transporting his remains in tea cans; A doctor is driving away hours before her wedding to settle an unfinished business; Parattai an out of work make-up man gets his hands dirty to earn some money; and there’s a burglar duo, and then there’s a cop,  Raghavan NM, who tries hard to bind these threads together.

Title: Estate
Overview: A journalist, along with her colleagues, decides to investigate the Covelone Estate, which is believed to be haunted. What follows is a series of events that puts their lives in danger.

Title: Parole
Overview: A mother's demise brings two egoistic and arrogant brothers together, transforming their lives for the better.

Title: Katchikkaaran
Overview: A party cadre, who is very loyal to his leader and works very hard for the party  and does not  even care about anything else including his personal life. When the same cadre is affected by the actions of the same leaders, he rises against him

Title: Undercover Rascals 2
Overview: Venkat works hard to bring down the largest drug empire in the nation. His plan is disrupted when Aditya Sharma is back from prison to seek his revenge.

Title: Anel Meley Pani Thuli
Overview: After being sexually assaulted, a woman realises that the perpetrators are people in power. Battling mental agony, she is now forced to fight social stigma.

Title: Anbulla Ghilli
Overview: Ghilli, a dog, navigates through several challenges and experiences with his owner as both of them attempt to win the hearts of their lovers.

Title: Miral
Overview: A family with a past and trauma, encounters a series of strange incidences, in a car journey on their way home and runs into trouble in a windmills farm.

Title: Yaaro
Overview: John is a loner, who is being framed for a series of murders; himself becomes a target of an unknown murderer who is dangerous and insanely brutal. As the murderer’s presence is felt everywhere, he must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical challenges on his ability to unravel the mystery of murders around him.

Title: Agent Kannayiram
Overview: A struggling private detective is drawn towards a mystery around unidentified dead bodies turning up near railway tracks, and soon the case becomes significant both at the professional and personal levels.

Title: Clap
Overview: Vishnu, a fast athlete runner, has multiple medals on his wall from state championships, he strives to win gold at the national level, but loses his leg & also his father in a tragic road accident, before he can. Later Vishnu settles into a mundane job and is yet to move past the incident that destroyed his career. When he encounters a young rural girl, a budding athlete, whose sportive interests are not encouraged by her near and dear, he takes her under his wings and fulfills his long-cherished dream through her eyes.

Title: Vezham
Overview: A young man tries to discover the identity of the killers of his girlfriend with only the voice of one of them as his clue.

Title: Trigger
Overview: An undercover cop has to stop the mastermind behind a child kidnapping racket, which will also lead to the redemption of his Azheimer's-affected father, a former policeman.

Title: Ward-126
Overview: The investigation over an IT professional's death faces twists and turns as truths about the victim start coming out and he is found to have had multiple marital relationships.

Title: Yutha Satham
Overview: A young woman is murdered right in front of a police station. The inspector at the station suspects her boyfriend, a private detective, who claims he is innocent. Who killed the girl and why?

Title: Nenjuku Needhi
Overview: An upright city-bred IPS officer investigates a mysterious case of three missing Dalit girls in a rural part of Tamil Nadu. While two are found dead, one is missing without any trace. Can he crack the case and get hold of the culprits?

Title: Arulmozhi
Overview: A private investigator accidently becomes a vigilante as he tries to save his friend and his family who are abducted by a dangerous militant group that is going to release a chemical bomb.

Title: Kaari
Overview: Kaari revolves around the life of a horse jockey in Chennai and how fate brings him to a small village in Ramanad district, who is about to witness the cruelty of money and power.

Title: Super Senior Heroes
Overview: Ganeshan, a 65-year-old widower to impress Aadith, his 7-year-old grandson, forms a pretend superhero league with his friends. When a young girl is kidnapped and Aadith expects his grandfather to rescue her, and they must unexpectedly take real action.

Title: Vaaitha
Overview: A poor Laundry worker gets injured in a road accident and finds himself struggling for justice. He and his family suffers, due to conflicts among two different caste groups.

Title: AGP
Overview: A girl loses her family to an accident and that leads her to this disorder along with hallucination and depression. Her boyfriend goes missing in a hospital which is all over the news for all the wrong reasons.

Title: Sembula Cheru
Overview: Sembula Cheru is an experimental hyperlink short film. In a 1990s Tamil Nadu remote village, Guru had to struggle for his love from three robbers, which ultimately does a good thing to a stranger.

Title: Dum Dum Dumeel
Overview: A guy who is about to get engaged and eventually get married, goes to an island for a holiday with his friends only to be entangled in unfortunate events with a gang of robbers. This will lead him to change his entire perspective on his life and life decisions.

Title: Kallan
Overview: A son of a hunter starts dealing with guns to make his ends meet. Little does he know that fate would start hunting him and his friends for his decisions.

Title: Seththumaan
Overview: Poochi lives in a small hut with his grandson Kumaresan, whose parents were killed in a caste riot a few years ago. Poochi has big dreams for Kumaresan and does all kinds of work to save money to get Kumaresan into a private school. When Vellaiyan, Poochi's beneficent but easily ruffled landlord instructs him to find a choice pig ('seththumaan'), Poochi and little Kumaresan get busy. However, once the pork and drink go down, tempers flare up, and Poochi must avoid getting caught up in the acerbic hostilities that consume his dominant caste overlords.

Title: Achcham Madam Naanam Payirppu
Overview: The story revolves around a teenager from a conservative family who struggles to strike a balance between societal expectations and personal desires. According to the popular adage, Achcham (Fear), Madam (Innocence), Naanam (Coyness), Payirppu (Chastity) are the four "ideal" qualities that every good Tamil girl must possess.

Title: Kathir
Overview: A beautiful bond between a youngster who has gone through many failures and an old woman with an inspiring past, and how the young man's life takes a turn after he learns the story of the older woman.

Title: Carbon
Overview: A man whose dreams come true tries to discover the identity of the hit-and-driver who has put his father in critical condition.

Title: Theal
Overview: A woman walks into the life of a debt collector, who works for a loan shark, claiming to be his mother. He tries to turn over a new leaf moved by her affection, but can he do so after having ruined the lives of so many people?

Title: College Road
Overview: Ajay, a college student develops software to help nab cyber criminals. At the same time, a cyber crime spree is happening in Chennai. The story revolves around Ajay's college days as he develops the software, falls in love, and heads toward his future. Will he be able to capture the criminals with his software

Title: Saayam
Overview: A realistic take on the issues while talking about downtrodden people in a derogatory manner.

Title: Koorman
Overview: A former cop with mind-reading skills gets involved in a case involving rape and murder. Can he crack it while keeping a lid on the ghosts of his own past?

Title: Poochandi
Overview: Thrill-seeking journalist Murugan heads to Malaysia to look for ordinary folks with odd stories, to be used as part of the true paranormal story collection he writes for a magazine. Everything goes well at first for him upon his arrival in Malaysia, that is until he encounters a supernatural experience that changes his life.

Title: Pothanur Thabal Nilayam
Overview: Praveen, an ambitious entrepreneur, is pushed to race against the clock and find the stolen money within the next 36 hours to save his father’s reputation and his family. Will the family survive this life-threatening situation?

Title: Pen Vilai Verum 999 Rubai Matume
Overview: A gang uses hidden cameras to take videos of women during their private time and blackmail them. Many women commit suicide due to the threat of this gang. Police starts to investigate the suicides.

Title: Kanal
Overview: A widowed mother of two children fights against the oppressive norms of society, determined to carve a better future for her family. As she navigates poverty and relentless hardships, she refuses to bow to fate, breaking free from the chains that seek to hold her back.

Title: Vidiyatha Iravondru Vendum
Overview: A Horror thriller happening during the course of one night, talks about If there's an accident, how we have to be more responsible on the road

Title: Jasper
Overview: Mr.J is an elderly, arrogant, and drunkard man who lives alone. Harish, a young bank manager, and his wife and children, join his life as neighbours. Harish is kidnapped by Vincent's team, and his wife approaches Jasper for rescue her husband. Mr.J embarks on a journey with Harish's little boy in order to save Harish from his old rival, Pastor Edward. He enlists the assistance of his old buddies on his travels. They're talking about his past, including his relationships with Seema, Harish, and Edward. Shankar Sharma, an investigating police officer, is looking into the background of Mr.J and his team, Pastor Edward, and the real purpose for the kidnapping. The thrilling adventure will give the answers to the following questions: did Mr.J save Harish? What is Mr.J's relationship with Harish and his family? Has Shankar Sharma successfully completed the case?

Title: Project C (Chapter 2)
Overview: An unemployed youngster gets a job that puts his life in a Topsy Turvy Game.

Title: Pandrikku Nandri Solli
Overview: Fate brings together a cop, a gangster and an aspiring filmmaker, who hail from different places. After the initial misunderstandings and confusions between them, they form as a team and go in search of a unique pig statue and a huge sum of money. But little did they know that they would have to face unheard hurdles and riddles to possess the statue and money.

Title: Nadhi
Overview: Thamizh, son of an auto-driver and Bharathi, who belongs to a politician family, fall in love with each other. Will they be able to lead a peaceful life amidst people with castiest mentalities?

Title: White Haired Princess
Overview: Near the end of the Ming Dynasty, the Emperor is seriously ill and during these turbulent times, Eunuch Wei of the Eastern Depot tries to seize power. The Wudang Sect is ordered to bring the red pill to the Emperor to treat his illness.

Title: Vattakara
Overview: Senthil,  Tharun, Mani , and Madhavan coincidentally meet on one journey and become good friends. To come out of their struggles and personal problems in their life finally, they collaborate with each other and made a plan to rob the Vattakara.

Title: Kaalangalil Aval Vasantham
Overview: A guy who is obsessed on having a filmy romantic life has to understand what love truly means after marrying a no nonsense entrepreneur.

Title: Mudhal Nee Mudivum Nee
Overview: A refreshing tale of a bunch of high school students, their dreams, first love, music, guitar, football, video cassettes and more.

Title: KADAL
Overview: A girl standing alone in the beach remembers moments with her ex at the same place .Yet even in solitude she finds peace

Title: Vidai
Overview: When two friends are unable to study for their upcoming exam, they decide to steal the exam paper from their teacher’s house to pass the test. What happens next forms the story

Title: Kaarottiyin Kaadhali
Overview: A cab driver gets caught between the internal affairs of a shady Singaporean businessman who has other plans in place

Title: Enjoy
Overview: The domination of social media which paves the way for opportunities for everyone to express their thoughts and opinions freely not only provided vast benefit to the audience but it also created waves of disaster in the society.  To present themselves with fashion and prestigious gadgets,  few youngsters step into this new technological world with the intention changing their lives overnight. Was this actually an opportunity to transform their lives or absolute disaster waiting in the dark shades is the story of ENJOY that will reveal.  A strong social message and multitude of complications intertwined in the story, the director chose adult comedy with intense materials of laughter through youngster’s language of new technological era.  The movie will make you laugh, cry and reshape your belief of the current events happening in everyone's home.

Title: Kambathe Kannemma
Overview: Kambathe Kannemma a Malaysian Tamil Movie presented by Maraz Ravi under D`Cinema Sdn Bhd. The movie was directed by KK Khanna.

Title: KAREN
Overview: Following Karen, a Malaysian teenage boy of Indian origin, this film documents his youth in a period of six years. Through Karen, we explore the hardship his people have endured and the eventual breakdown of his family both caused by the racial discrimination and education inequality in Malaysia.

An aspiring film director along with his wife goes to a resort to write a story. When he begins writing the story, some paranormal force prevents him from penning the story. What is the mystic force? Can he saves himself and his wife?

Title: Erisudar
Overview: Erisudar pits predeterminism against free will. The constant battle between these two concepts is a lifelong experience for the conscious mind, which yields no peaceful conclusion.

Title: Udanpaal
